subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer made a big move yesterday at Magnolia Grove in Mobile, Ala., in a bid to join Lorena Ochoa and Suzann Pettersen as the L.P.G.A. Tour’s only multiple winners this year. Creamer shot a bogey-free, seven-under-par 65 to open a five-stroke advantage in the Tournament of Champions. She won the SBS Open in February.
